mapper.select: SELECT board_idx AS id ,title ,contents ,hit_cnt ,DATE_FORMAT(created_datetime, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS created_datetime FROM t_board WHERE deleted_yn = 'N' ORDER BY board_idx DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE t_board SET hit_cnt = hit_cnt + 1 WHERE board_idx = #{id}
